I have installed the the build of today, and it seems to have been solved..
I'll keep you posted this week.

I can't make sense of the log. There's no code on line 257 of JavaEditor. 
There's nothing in JavaEditor.synchronizeOutlinePageSelection() which could 
possibly throw an NPE. I tested with Sun's JDK 1.4b3 from October.

Ok, I didn't realize this was specific to the nightly build of 20020211. This 
is fixed in the integration build of 20020212.
